price: Ni uteremsho utokao kwa Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.
footnotes: Hii ni uteremsho unao toka kwa Mwenye kuwaangalia walimwengu wote kwa kuwaumba na kuwalea.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
